options.title: Blue bolt
options.description: A strikingly beautiful, selectively bred variety of the Caridina cantonensis species, part of the Taiwan Bee shrimp family. Blue Bolt shrimp are known for their vibrant blue hues, ranging from light sky blue to deep, intense shades. This coloration is the result of careful selective breeding, focusing on developing the blue pigmentation in these shrimp, which makes them a popular choice among shrimp enthusiasts and breeders.
